column5: Enjoy a memorable vacation in this fully furnished, 2 bedroom/2 bath 6th Floor Condo (with elevator), comfortable for sleeping 6 people. The spacious living room is furnished with comfortable seating with cable TV. The kitchen is perfect for dining as it is equipped with pots, pans , flatware, coffee maker and dishwasher. Situated next to the Schlitterbahn Beach Resort and Water Park.  SPI Permit  The SPI tax rate is 17% Airbnb is collecting 6% Included in the nightly rate is 11%
column8: More Fun in the Sun, 2/2 Next to Schlitterbahn
